name: Nokia-Gachi
description:
This is a prototype for a virtual pet project I am working on. I wanna include more pets and branching paths for the Upgrades, but this was just seeing if I could get the basics. Take care of your pet as he Upgrades to the next levels. This is a good game to leave open while trying others!

Don't get three strikes on Care.(He will also die from old age)

S - Shows Stats

C - Cleans up poop

F - Feeds

Enjoy!
